Title: Relates to regulation of geological man-made mechanical boat attractions
Summary: Provides for the regulation of geological man-made mechanical boat attractions on man-made waterways, tunnels and lakes by the office of parks, recreation and historical preservation.
LawCode: Amd §870-c, Lab L; amd §§1.03 & 13.13, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to regulation of geological man-made mechanical boat attractions
